caseStudyDescription.caseStudyDescription: Pro bono non-profit design and research work

caseStudyContent.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"I worked with a non-profit in NYC in a team of two researchers and designers, a product manager, and a number of volunteer developers to shape a digital product for use in canvassing and progressive organizing. Through heuristic evaluation, usability tests, interviews, and collaborative design, my design and research partner and I provided clarity on key usability issues to prioritize, created a simple design system, and designed a longer term vision for the product that we presented at an annual kickoff meeting.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
